sense.gloss: to touch, to be in contact, to be affixed
to be equivalent to, to be applicable, to apply to
to be right on the money (of a prediction, criticism, etc.)
to be selected (in a lottery, etc.), to win
to be successful, to go well, to be a hit
to be stricken (by food poisoning, heat, etc.), to be afflicted
to be called on (e.g. by a teacher)
to treat (esp. harshly), to lash out at
to be hitting well, to be on a hitting streak
(of fruit, etc.) to be bruised, to spoil
to feel (something) out, to probe into, to check (i.e. by comparison)
to be a relative of a person, to be a ... in relation to ..., to stand in a relationship

sdata.j: ↑果物↑↓くだもの↓は↑日↑↓ひ↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|と↑腐↑↓くさ↓る。
その↑駅↑↓えき↓は↑普通↑↓ふつう↓なら↑午後↑↓ごご↓のラッシュ↑時↑↓じ↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|↑時間↑↓じかん↓もほとんど↑人↑↓じん↓がいない。
sdata.e: The station is almost empty during what would normally be the afternoon rush.

sdata.j: この↑部屋↑↓へや↓は↑良↑↓よ↓く↑日↑↓ひ↓が|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|。
sdata.e: This room gets a lot of sunshine.

sdata.j: ↑今年↑↓ことし↓のバレンタインデーは↑日曜日↑↓にちようび↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|。
sdata.e: St. Valentine's Day falls on Sunday this year.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑弾↑↓たま↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|のが↑怖↑↓こわ↓かったので、↑階下↑↓かいか↓に↑走↑↓はし↓って↑降↑↓お↓りていったの。
sdata.e: We were afraid that we might be hit by a bullet, so we ran downstairs.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓は↑今年↑↓ことし↓は↑金曜日↑↓きんようび↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|。
sdata.e: My birthday falls on Friday this year.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓は↑日曜日↑↓にちようび↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|。
↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑屋根↑↓やね↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|↑雨↑↓あめ↓の↑音↑↓おと↓が↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
sdata.e: I love the sound of rain on the roof.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑顔↑↓かお↓に↑冷↑↓つめ↓たい↑風↑↓かぜ↓が|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|のを↑感↑↓かん↓じた。
sdata.e: I felt a cold wind on my face.

sdata.j: ↑歯茎↑↓はぐき↓に|↑当↑↓あ↓たる|ところはないですか。
